mapper.update:
update rc_order_prod_evaluation
PROD_ID = #{prodId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SCORE = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_ANOY = #{isAnoy,jdbcType=BIT},
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
BUYER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MERCHANT_REPLY = #{merchantReply,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
PROD_SKU_ID = #{prodSkuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VENDOR_ID = #{vendorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_USER_ID = #{merchantUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ORDER_PROD_ID = #{orderProdId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ORDER_PROD_ID, PROD_ID, CREATE_TIME, SCORE, IS_ANOY, ORDER_ID, BUYER_ID, MERCHANT_REPLY, DEL_FLAG, PROD_SKU_ID, MERCHANT_ID, VENDOR_ID, CONTENT, MERCHANT_USER_ID from rc_order_prod_evaluation where ORDER_PROD_ID = #{orderProdId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
